post1.caption:
“LOST FROM ABOVE“

@dji.era x @joeadimara #DJIMavic3 

@djiglobal @urbanrepublicid 

Time is mortal, it can’t be repeated.  Nothing left but memories to remember. 
There are only 2 choices in life, be good or be the best. Never stop learning and don’t forget to listen on what your heart tells you.

Embrace the freedom and give yourself time to notice what’s around you. What you breathe, what you see and what you hear, they are the perfect lesson for us to learn from, take the good and leave the bad. Take it easy and don’t forget to share what you’ve learned. Until next time!

post3.caption:
Hidden amongst the forest, is  a massive waterfall called Kabut Pelangi. 

I’ve been to so many waterfalls and I think this is one of the haviest ones in terms of its water volume, creating those beautiful pours around that it will form a rainbow when sunshine hits, just like its name. On the other side, it also makes the wind blows so hard but not a problem for my #Mavic3 @dji.era 

This is just a right place for it to show off 😂 

In a few days, you’ll get to watch it too so wait for it🔥 
_
W/ @saromoberandal_ @gensavana @hendriwlsss @eunike_fersa @hisyamlallana_ 

@djiglobal @urbanrepublicid 
#DJIIndonesia #EranyaDJI #UrbanRepublicID #Indonesia #Mavic3

post4.caption:
Count Down “LOST FROM ABOVE” 
_
Here are my fav snaps of an amazing lake using #Mavic3 @dji.era

Regulo Lake is a perfect space to try out the new powerful #DJIMavic3 from @dji.era 

The quality of this drone is incredible and what I especially like about it compared to the previous ones I’ve used, is the capability to shoot with 120 fps and 7x zoom, both in 4K size. Making it possible to achive the shots I’ve always wanted! Not only that, there are also other phenomenal features made for adventurous creators; 5.1K video, 46 minutes battery life, and designated power to fly in strong winds. Ready to step up your game?!

W/ @saromoberandal_ @gensavana @hendriwlsss @eunike_fersa @hisyamlallana_ 

@djiglobal @urbanrepublicid 
#DJIIndonesia #EranyaDJI #UrbanRepublicID #Indonesia #Mavic3

post1.caption:
Perjalanan kali ini bercerita di salah satu titik di Jawa Timur. 
PRONOJIWO, surga di bawah kaki gunung Semeru, yang kali ini menunjukan kemagisannya. 
Menembus hutan liar hingga megahnya tumpak sewu serta cantiknya kapas biru
semuanya terbingkai sempurna dengan menggunakan #SonyA7C dan #compactGlens dari @sonyalpha_id.

Sehingga untuk mengabadikan moment apapun jadi lebih mudah dan efisien karena designnya yang ringkas dan ringan menjadi teman setia dalam perjalananku.

taken with Sony Alpha 7C + Sony FE 24mm f 2.8 G + Sony FE 40mm f 2.5 G

#SonyAlpha_id #BeAlpha #SonyAlpha #meanda7c #compactGlens @sonyalpha_id @sonyindonesia

post2.caption:
Drones all in one, complete features and compact size when making my travel content even more beautiful, especially for use in the forest or to the mountains.

 Finally,  make content that had complete maneuver details and track modes to make this drone an All in one!  I immediately tried it guys to explore epic places in East Java.

 The DJI Air 2S has three color profiles, Normal 8-bit, D-Log 10bit, and HLG 10bit, so great for Color Grading when editing!

 Starting from the 1-inch CMOS sensor with 20MP resolution, the sensor is bigger than the 0.5-inch sensor embedded in the Mavic Air 2.

 The video features are also complete from 5.4K resolution at 24/25/30 fps and can also record 4K 60 fps video, the results are really crazy.

 No more worries when traveling to explore anywhere and anytime, whether it's to the mountains or through the forest, it is now more comfortable and safer because the DJI Air 2S is equipped with 2 additional sensors at the top so when flying, you can avoid 4-sided obstacles when advancing, backward, downward and upward. .  So you can fly at will for maximum results

 For all of you who like adventure or make any photo / video, the solution is only at DJI Air 2S and you can get it at @ dji.era & @urbanrepublicid

 Team up @_ahmadtito @waaa.dewaa @gharunna
 #DJIAir2s #DJI #DJIIndonesia #DJIGlobal #UrbanRepublicID

post3.caption:
Drone semua menjadi satu, fitur fitur yang lengkap serta ukuran yang ringkas saat membuat konten perjalananku semakin ciamik apalagi untuk di pakai di hutan maupun ke gunung. 

Akhirnya datang juga ke Indonesia, tak sabar bikin konten yang lengkap details manuver serta track modenya menjadikan drone ini All in one ! Langsung aku cobain guys buat explore Tempat tempat epic di Jawa Timur. 

DJI Air 2S ini memiliki tiga profil warna, Normal 8-bit, D-Log 10bit, dan HLG 10bit, enak banget buat di Color Grading saat editing ! 

Mulai dari sensor CMOS 1-inci beresolusi 20MP, sensos tersebut lebih besar dibanding sensor 0,5 inci yang tersemat di Mavic Air 2.

Fitur videonya pun lengkap dari resolusi 5,4K pada 24/25/30 fps dan juga dapat merekam video 4K 60 fps, gila banget hasilnya. 

Tak khawatir lagi saat perjalanan explore kemanapun dan kapanpun entah itu ke gunung atau menyusuri hutan sekarang menjadi lebih nyaman dan aman  karena DJI Air 2S dilengkapi 2 sensor tambahan dibagian atas jadi saat terbang bisa menghindari rintangan 4 sisi saat maju, mundur, ke bawah dan ke atas. Jadi bisa terbang sesuka hati untuk hasil yang maksimal 

Buat kalian semua yang suka berpetualang ataupun bikin  foto/video apapun solusinya hanya di DJI Air 2S dan kalian bisa dapatkan di @dji.era & @urbanrepublicid 

Team up @_ahmadtito @waaa.dewaa @gharunna 
#DJIAir2s #DJI #DJIIndonesia #DJIGlobal #UrbanRepublicID

post8.caption:
Mencari tempat baru dan pengalaman baru hal yg paling aku demen sih selain itu Travel essentials yang wajib dibawa saat traveling dan menemani kerja sebagai Travel Fotografer yang memiliki mobilitas tinggi seperti aku ya ini nih “IT” 

Pengalaman kemarin, saat di kaki gunung Welirang  powerbank bisa dibawa kemana” sangat compatible untuk kegiatan outdoor sepeti ini, Tahan segala kondisi dan desainnya cukup elegan.

Dan juga ada adapter port yang sangat membantuku ketika bekerja. Macem-macem port seperti tambahan port USB, memory card, micro sd card, dll

Sangat recommended buat teman-teman yang butuh travel essentials berkualitas, Simple dan solid seperti yang biasa aku bawa kemana mana.

This is our journey welcoming to this powerful gadget with our best  Journey.
PH : @IndischeNetwork 
DOP / Director : @Joeadimara_
Videographer : @gharunna 
Photographer : @Joeadimara_

@livewithIT_id
